title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets: Inside the Recent Military Attacks on Lebanese Terror Infrastructures”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A military position from where launches were made into Israeli territory alongside terror infrastructures; The IDF attacked in Lebanese territory.

In the last few hours, fighter jets attacked terror targets of the Hezbollah terror organization.

Among the targets attacked were an observation post in the Al-Khiyam area, a military post in the Zibqin village area, from which launches were made earlier today towards the Shlomi area, and several terror infrastructures.

Also, during the day, a combat helicopter attacked an observation post in the Ramia area, where terrorists were located, and artillery fire was also carried out to eliminate threats in the Itron area.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/48ljbud
